scenes.background: Monica and Bob are discussing the celebration. Bob looks uncertain.
scenes.description: Im not sure if everyone will enjoy a formal dinner.

options.text: A formal dinner can be a great way to celebrate our success.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the formality of the dinner, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: We should consider if everyone is comfortable with a formal setting.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and self-regulation by considering everyone's comfort, but social skill and perception were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we can find a less formal venue that still feels special.
options.analysis: You suggested a compromise, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
